rules_text:
Choose one –
• Put two 1/1 white and blue Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
• Creatures you control with flying get +1/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you don't control get -1/-0 until end of turn.
If your ancestry in blue is five or greater, you may choose all three instead. [i](Each blue card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in blue.)[/i]
